lead_paragraph: SUSSILLO--Joseph M.,on January 31, 2016. Veteran, U.S. Army. Graduate of St. John's Law School. Practicing attorney in Bay Ridge for over 35 years. Distinguished delegate at the Republican National Convention. Active in federal, state, and city republican concerns. Member of the Armand J. Starace Republican Club, Knights of Columbus Council 8048 and many other civic and fraternal organizations. Loving husband of the late Margot (nee Curley). Dear brother of the late William, Pauline, Nicholas, and Gerard. Beloved uncle to four nieces and four nephews. Visiting Wednesday 2-4 and 7-9pm at Clavin Funeral Home, 7722 4th Ave., Brooklyn. Mass of Christian Burial Thursday, 9:30am at Our Lady of Angels R.C. Church. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SUSSILLO, JOSEPH M.
